results.title: Children of the damned
results.creator_credit: Anton M Leader, Ben Arbeid, Lawrence P Bachmann Productions and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Six children that no one seems to know where they came from and when a psychologist attempts to find out the future of mankind is placed in jeopardy. Cast includes Ian hendry, Alan Badel, Barbara Ferris, Alfred Burke.

results.title: Words and music
results.creator_credit: Norman Taurog, Arthur Freed and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: A musical version of the lives and work of Richard Rodgers and Lorenz Hart featuring twenty-two of their songs. Cast includes Mickey Rooney (Lorenz Hart), Tom Drake (Richard Rodgers), Marshall Thompson, Janet Leigh, Betty Garrett, Ann Sothern, June Allyson, Perry Como, Judy Garland, Lena Horne, Gene Kelly.

results.title: Starstruck [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Gillian Armstrong, David Elfick, Richard Brennan and Palm Beach Pictures
results.brief_description: A comic musical set in Sydney against the background of a new wave of Australian music in the early 1980s. A reluctant barmaid in her family’s hotel, Jackie (Jo Kennedy) wants to be a singing star and is assisted by her eccentric 14 year old cousin, willing to manipulate the media to make his cousin famous. Cast includes Ross O’Donovan, Max Cullen and Margo Lee. Original music by “The Swingers” and “Mental As Anything”.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gillian Armstrong, David Elfick, Richard Brennan and Palm Beach Pictures

results.title: Around the world under the sea
results.brief_description: Action adventure film about a group of scientists led by Dr Doug Standish (Lloyd Bridges) who set out in a submarine to plant sensors along the world’s ocean floors as an early warning earthquake alert following worldwide increased seismic activity. Cast includes Brian Kelly, David McCallum, Keenan Wynn, Marshall Thompson, Gary Merrill, Shirley Eaton.

results.title: Summerfield [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Ken Hannam, Patricia Lovell and Clare Beach Films
results.brief_description: When a newcomer arrives in a small, secluded town to discover that the former teacher has disappeared, he probes into the mystery and becomes more and more intrigued by the inhabitants of a forbidding house called Summerfield. Eventually, the secrets of Summerfield are revealed in a dramatic ending with a shock twist. Directed by Ken Hannam (director of “Sunday Too Far Away”) and starring, Nick Tate, Elizabeth Alexander and John Waters, “Summerfield” was shot on location at Victoria’s Phillip and Churchill Islands.

results.title: Roadgames = Road games [DVD] (D)
results.creator_credit: Richard Franklin, Essaness Pictures and Quest Films
results.brief_description: A psychopathic killer is haunting the Nullarbor Highway in search of female hitch-hikers whom he picks up, rapes, kills and dismembers. An eccentric, long-haul truck driver determines to track down the murderer and is helped by a young hitch-hiker he picks up. Stars Stacy Keach and Jamie Lee Curtis.

results.title: Duchess of Idaho

results.brief_description: A romantic comedy musical featuring Esther Williams, Van Johnson, Paula Raymond and John Lund. Guest appearances by Red Skelton, Eleanor Powell and Lena Horne.

results.title: Meet me in Las Vegas
results.creator_credit: Roy Rowland, Joe Pasternak and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: While vacationing in Las Vegas with his mother, a wealthy Nevada rancher meets a ballet dancer who brings him luck at the roulette wheel. Shot on location in the renowned Sands Hotel, the film captures the glitz and glamour of the neon-lit gamblers’ paradise in its martini-era prime and features numerous cameo appearances by famous actors and Las Vegas entertainers including Frank Sinatra, Paul Henreid, Lena Horne, Frankie Laine and Peter Lorre. A song and dance highlight, featuring Cyd Charisse, is the thirteen minute bop parody of the ballad ‘Frankie and Johnny’ with special lyrics by Sammy Cahn sung by Sammy Davis Jr. Other songs include ‘The Gal With The Yaller Shoes’, ‘If You Can’t Dream’, ‘My Lucky Charm’, ‘Hell Hath No Fury’, ‘I Refuse To Rock ‘N Roll’

results.title: That midnight kiss
results.creator_credit: Norman Taurog, Joe Pasternak and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: An opera singer (Kathryn Grayson) would like to have a tenor who looks the part of the tenor role. When Lanza, a singing truck driver is discovered, she gets her wish - and a happy ending isn’t far away. Cast also includes Jose Iturbi, Ethel Barrymore, Keenan Wynn, J. Carrol Naish, Thomas Gomez.

results.title: The Merry widow
results.creator_credit: Curtis Bernhardt, Joe Pasternak and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Based on the operetta by Franz Lehar, libretto by Victor Leon and Leo Stein, this film adaptation stars Lana Turner as the “merry widow” supported by Thomas Gomez as the King of Marshovia and Fernando Lamas as the young Count Danilo. Oscar nominated for Best Art Direction/Set Decoration and Best Costumes. Cast also includes Una Merkel, Richard Haydn.
